title: Week 6 Road Tests and a Visit from Undefeated Kansas's QB
description:
Wendi Nix, Desmond Howard, and David Pollack look ahead to an exciting week 6 and discuss some of the biggest road tests from Baton Rouge, LA to Los Angeles, CA. Plus, Kansas QB Jalon Daniels joins the show to discuss the undefeated Jayhawks. Then, Tiffany Green and Jay Walker give an update from around HBCU football including Coach Sanders and Jackson State looking to get redemption against Alabama State.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew breaks down some of the biggest games for Week 6 and Jalon Daniels joins the show
